/* eslint-disable react-hooks/exhaustive-deps */ import React, {useContext, useEffect, useState} from 'react' import AuthContext from '../../context/autenticacion/AuthContext' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import service from '../../config/axios' export default function Proyectos(props) { // Extraer la info de autenticaciÃ³n const authContext = useContext(AuthContext) const { usuario, editarUsuario, eliminarUsuario } = authContext const [usuarios, guardarUsuario] = useState(usuario) console.log(usuarios) const onChange = (e) => { e.preventDefault() guardarUsuario({ ...usuarios, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const onSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() // pasarlo al action await editarUsuario({ name: usuarios.name, email: usuarios.email, password: usuarios.password, address: usuarios.address, mobile: usuarios.mobile }) } // const { name, email, password, address, mobile, confirmar } = usuarios const eliminar = () =>{ eliminarUsuario() } return ( <>

This is Your profile

Name: {usuario.name}

Email: {usuario.email}

Address: {usuario.address}

Mobile: {usuario.mobile}

Check

View Your Cart
View Store
{/* Delete Profile */}

EDIT YOUR PROFILE

By signing up, you agree to our Terms, Data Policy and Cookies Policy.

) }
